
##################################################################
### Terrain Categories
###
###

#Reorganised by Draiocht
#First flat lands, Farmland-Grassland-Dryland-Steppe
#Then normal types, Woods-Forest-Coastline-Marsh
#Then hilly types, Hills-Highlands-Mountains
#Then exotic types, Savannah-Jungle-Desert-Coastal Desert-Glacial
#Other unused types at the bottom, except pti, which I dont want to mess with because I have no idea what it is for
#Also organised modifers into Colour-Sound-Supply-Movement Cost-Development Cost-Allowed Buildings-ND Cost-Defense-Defensiveness

categories =  {
	pti = {
		type = pti
	}
	
	farmlands = {
		color = { 179 255 64 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 6
		movement_cost = 1.0			#vanilla 1.10
		local_development_cost = -0.05
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.10
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, good soil, mild weather
		local_build_cost = -0.1			#Plenty of people, easy access to trade routes for building supplies, established quarries, good infrastructure

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			104 109 108 1744 1865 172 160 125 506 507 510 522 523 524 532 540 555 556 558 561 563 2026 2044 2045 2047  
			2060 2063 2075 2095 115 117 118 121 1862 916 917 920 925 930 2532 584 600 153 361 613 2380

			1028 1030 735 2745

			4288
			#From vanilla India
			2076 4415 4416 4428 4476 4479 4487 4489 4490 4496 4497 4510 4513

	grasslands = {
		color = { 130 255 47 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 4
		movement_cost = 1.0			#vanilla 1.0
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.05
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, good soil

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla

	drylands = {
		color = { 232 172 102 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 3
		movement_cost = 1.00			#vanilla 1.00
		local_development_cost = 0.15
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.95
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, hard soil
		local_build_cost = 0.1			#Few trees for building materials, alternate building materials take more time to gather, lower pop density for labour

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			411 454 442 441 1973 444 446 453 345 2473 1089 1091 382 1925 1749 224 221 1750 220 214 2754

		type = plains

		local_development_cost = 0.25

		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.90
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, hard soil
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#No building materials nearby, typically minimal established infrastructure

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla

	woods = {
		color = { 41 155 22 }
		type = forest
		sound_type = forest

		supply_limit = 4
		movement_cost = 1.10			#vanilla 1.10
		local_development_cost = 0.05
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.0

		movement_cost = 1.50			#vanilla 1.25
		local_development_cost = 0.25
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.95
		defence = 2

	marsh = {
		color = { 13 189 130 }
		type = marsh
		sound_type = forest

		supply_limit = 2
		movement_cost = 1.50			#vanilla 1.3
		local_development_cost = 0.30
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.90
		defence = 1
		local_build_time = 0.25			#Difficult soil requires special construction and safeguards against flooding, sinking, and rotting
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#Low quality construction supplies, extra care must be taken and extra rot/sink/flood-proof foundations built

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1860 97 100 2857 2890 893 927 928 2534 2536 2516 749 758 775 777 1217 2259 2261 2286 2287 2759 277
			1031 2702

			7954 8119 8118 8112 4383 8013 8021 4381 99 
			
			#BT13.0
			243 4370 1860 8156 375 8161 8192
		}
	}

	highlands = {
		color = { 176 129 21 }
		type = hills
		sound_type = mountain

		supply_limit = 1
		movement_cost = 1.70			#vanilla 1.40
		local_development_cost = 0.40
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.85
		defence = 1
		local_defensiveness = 0.2
		local_build_time = 0.25			#Rough uneven terrain
		local_build_cost = 0.1			#Few good construction supplies

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1968 520 536 542 544 578 2035 2077 2079 2085 2087 2093 850 852 853 2621 2622 2623 2626 2628 2629 2644 2646 2645

			#Shit Draiocht missed in 1.26 Dharma
			4422 4436 4464 #Central India

			5213 4566 5857 5018 5855 8072 1748 8070 8086 8117 216 8036 8051 8049 4788 8064 8057 8088 8065 4549 4547 
			
			#BT13.0
			3014 4380 251 8152 252 3137 8153 4110 8210 8204 1318 8181 8178 8179 4236 8222
		}
	}
	
	mountain = {
		color = { 105 24 4 }
		type = mountains
		sound_type = mountain

		supply_limit = 1
		movement_cost = 2.5			#vanilla 1.5
		local_development_cost = 0.50
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.85
		defence = 3
		local_defensiveness = 0.50
		local_build_time = 0.5			#Extemely rough, uneven terrain. Also great gameplay. You want a superfort? Then you have to pay for it then wait.
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#Plenty of stone and often decent wood, but very difficult, expensive and time consuming to build in this terrain

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1952 974 975 976 977 2480 2486 2609 2610 2612 2613 936 2155 808 814 2825 452 2073 1273
			1078 1787 1788 120 1026 783 794 802 824 856 857 860 2617 2618 2813 2817 2824 2826 2871 2874 2395 2396 583 587 2877

			# 1.29 Manchuria
			4653 4655 4656 4680 4679
			#Shit from 1.26 Dharma patch that Draiocht forgot.
			4481
			
			
			#Beyond Typus
			4128 3167 4694 4546 3193 3114 2197 2201 2202 2203 3262 4541 261 128 132 
			2444 2482 813 817 832 2818 2619 782 2872 422 462 2196 423 3253 2946 2835 2838 827 2227 413 2210 2003 2479

	savannah = {
		color = { 248 199 23  }
		sound_type = plains
	
		supply_limit = 2
		movement_cost = 1.00			#vanilla 1.00
		local_development_cost = 0.30
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.95	
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, like the farm and grasslands above.
		local_build_cost = 0.1			#Mostly small vegetation and trees for construction supplies and weatherproofing is difficult.
		
		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			768 776 2805 2809 2810 2812 2814 2815 2855 2859 2879 2884 2887 2893 2895 2897 2908 2909 2910 2918 2923 2925 2926 2939 1116

			2907 2911 2919 2920 1136 1137 1150 1160 2240 2285 2267 1190 1191 1193 1194 2774 2775 2794 2266 2886 2924 1187 1189
			
			#Beyond Typus
			2243 2246 2260 2262 2264 2268 2269 1132 1133 2273 2276 1115 2244 1156 2282 2284 1157 1158 2288 2932 774 1221 2800 2802

	jungle = {
		color = { 98 163 18 }
		type = jungle
		sound_type = jungle

		supply_limit = 2
		movement_cost = 2.0			#vanilla 1.5
		local_development_cost = 0.35
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.9
		defence = 2
		local_build_time = 0.5			#Rough, uneven terrain and dense vegetation to be cleared
		local_build_cost = 0.1			#Rough terrain and extremely humid weather requires some extra attention

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1237 1245 2703 746 838 2731 534 535 537 546 547 551  560 564 566 567 568 570 571 573 1946 1950 2028 2029 2034 2038 2042

	desert = {
		color = { 242 242 111 }
		type = desert
		sound_type = desert
	
		supply_limit = 0
		movement_cost = 1.40			#vanilla 1.05
		local_development_cost = 0.75
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		local_build_time = 0.50			#Ever try building on sand... it isn't easy
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#All materials need to be imported, extreme weather causes material attrition, no labour pools to draw upon
		
		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			503 2078 2088 512 513 514 2064 2066 2086 867 2844 350 355 2271 2272 2773 715 2119 2120 710 711 712 2121 2123 
			2191 2192 706 707 708 698 701 709 720 2193 2747 4204 4207 4208 4221 4223 
			
			#1.29 Manchu
			4669
			
			#Shit Draiocht forgot in India 1.26 Dharma
			4502 4506 4507 4508
			
			#Beyond Typus
			2466 2780 2784 2785 1207 1208 2778 2792 2779 2781 876 2363 2124 2478 739 2498 407 2314
			405 2458 351 349 346 4051 4055 4073 5815 5845 4967 5845 5395 5396 5397 
			1228 1231 1234 2322 2797 5277 5278 5279 5281 5284 5302 #Upper Nile
		}	
	}

		type = desert
		sound_type = desert

		supply_limit = 0
		movement_cost = 1.20			#vanilla 1.0
		local_development_cost = 0.65
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		local_build_time = 0.50			#Ever try building on sand... it isn't easy
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#All materials need to be imported, extreme weather causes material attrition, no labour pools to draw upon
		
		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1174 389 394 395 396 397 398 2329 2331 2333 2340 2341 2342 792 793 796 805 806 2821 2822 2840 2841 1212 
			1215 1230 1232 2315 2320 2321 2765 2786 2788 2789 1206 1209 2024 2790 2793 

			#Beyond Typus
			2324 2346 387 388 347 1111 2828 812 809 2826 2782 2783 2795 1175 364 365 2325 2326 353 355 2451 2452 865 866

		}

	glacier = {
		color = { 235 235 235 }
		sound_type = desert

		supply_limit = 0
		movement_cost = 2.0			#vanilla 1.25
		local_development_cost = 2.0
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		defence = 2
		local_build_time = 0.5			#Try building on ice, on a slope, in -40 degrees, with a polar bear chasing you, in a blizzard...
		local_build_cost = 0.5			#Most expensive terrain to build on. Arctic should stay low dev and weak

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			1104 1105 2074 2128 2129 2025 3111 3112 3113 
			
			#Beyond Typus
			998 2574 4969 4970 4971 4976 4990 4991 4992 4993 4994 4995 4996 4997 4998 5006 5007 5067 5069 5071 5075 5076 1811
			5588 5589 5590 5591 1805 5595 5596 5093 2425 3285 1072 5678 5070 5074 5073 5072 1812 8012 8011 8545 
		}
	}

	impassable_mountains = {
		color = { 128 128 128 }
		sound_type = desert
		movement_cost = 8.0
		defence = 6
		local_development_cost = 10
	}
	
	ocean = {
		color = { 255 255 255 }
		sound_type = sea
		movement_cost = 1.0
		is_water = yes
	}

	inland_ocean = {
		color = { 0 0 200 }
		sound_type = sea
		movement_cost = 1.0
		is_water = yes
		inland_sea = yes
	}
}
	
##################################################################
### Graphical terrain
###		type	=	refers to the terrain defined above, "terrain category"'s 
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see terrain.bmp)
###

terrain = {
	grasslands			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	0	 } }
	hills				= { type = hills			color = { 	1	 } }
	desert_mountain		= { type = mountain			color = { 	2	 } }
	desert				= { type = desert			color = { 	3	 } }

	plains				= { type = grasslands		color = { 	4	 } }
	terrain_5			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	5	 } }
	mountain			= { type = mountain			color = { 	6	 } }
	desert_mountain_low	= { type = desert			color = { 	7	 } }

	terrain_8			= { type = hills			color = { 	8	 } }
	marsh				= { type = marsh			color = { 	9	 } }
	terrain_10			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	10	 } }
	terrain_11			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	11	 } }

	forest_12			= { type = forest			color = { 	12	 } }
	forest_13			= { type = forest			color = { 	13	 } }
	forest_14			= { type = forest			color = { 	14	 } }
	ocean				= { type = ocean			color = { 	15	 } }

	snow				= { type = mountain 		color = { 	16	 } } # (SPECIAL CASE) Used to identify permanent snow
	inland_ocean_17 	= { type = inland_ocean		color = {	17	 } }

	coastal_desert_18	= { type = coastal_desert	color = { 	19	 } }
	coastline			= { type = coastline		color = { 	35	 } }
	
	savannah			= { type = savannah 		color = {	20	 } }
	drylands			= { type = drylands			color = {	22	 } }
	highlands			= { type = highlands		color = {	23	 } }
	dry_highlands		= { type = highlands		color = {	24	 } }
	
	woods				= { type = woods			color = { 	255	 } }
	jungle				= { type = jungle			color = { 	254	 } }
	
	terrain_21			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	21	 } }	
}

##################################################################
### Tree terrain
###		terrain	=	refers to the terrain tag defined above
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see tree.bmp)
###

tree = {
	forest				= { terrain = forest 			color = { 	3 4 6 7 19 20	} }
	woods				= { terrain = woods 			color = { 	2 5 8 18	} }
	jungle				= { terrain = jungle 			color = { 	13 14 15	} }
	palms				= { terrain = desert 			color = { 	12	} }
	savana				= { terrain = grasslands 		color = { 	27 28 29 30	} }
}
